cause.description:
Have an Anti-Bush slogan or pic? Maybe even a video? Well, you've come to the right place my friend. Post away, and leave no Bush unturned. Remembr: Theres a terrorist behind every Bush!
1. Exposing The Real Terrorists
2. Seeking The Truth When All Around You Is Murky Oil
3. Stopping The Bushit
cause.mission: Let's Bomb Texas. They Have Oil Too !!
cause.name: More Trees, Less Bush
